metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3541 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Repositories component in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allows remote attackers to conduct PHP object injection attacks and execute arbitrary code via serialized data associated with an add-on.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
